job.title: Data Scientist, Principal Associate
job.description: Plano 6 31066 United States of America Plano TexasbrbrData Scientist Principal AssociatebrbrstrongLead Data ScientistbrbrstrongData is at the center of everything we do As a startup we disrupted the credit card industry by individually personalizing every credit card offer using statistical modeling and the relational database cutting edge technology in 1988 Fastforward a few years and this little innovation and our passion for data has skyrocketed us to a Fortune 200 company and a leader in the world of datadriven decisionmakingbrbrAs a Data Scientist at Capital One youll be part of a team thats leading the next wave of disruption at a whole new scale using the latest in computing and machine learning technologies and operating across billions of customer records to unlock the big opportunities that help everyday people save money time and agony in their financial livesbrbrRole DescriptionbrbrstronguIn This Role You WillbrustrongulliPartner with a crossfunctional team of data scientists software engineers and product managers to deliver a product customers loveliliLeverage a broad stack of technologies  Python Conda AWS H2O Spark and more  to reveal the insights hidden within huge volumes of numeric and textual dataliliBuild machine learning models through all phases of development from design through training evaluation validation and implementationliliFlex your interpersonal skills to translate the complexity of your work into tangible business goalsbrliulstronguThe Ideal Candidate IsbrustrongulliCustomer first You love the process of analyzing and creating but also share our passion to do the right thing You know at the end of the day its about making the right decision for our customersliliInnovative You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies You stay current on published stateoftheart methods technologies and applications and seek out opportunities to apply themliliCreative You thrive on bringing definition to big undefined problems You love asking questions and pushing hard to find answers Youre not afraid to share a new idealiliTechnical Youre comfortable with opensource languages and are passionate about developing further You have handson experience developing data science solutions using opensource tools and cloud computing platformsliliStatisticallyminded Youve built models validated them and backtested them You know how to interpret a confusion matrix or a ROC curve You have experience with clustering classification sentiment analysis time series and deep learningliliA data guru Big data doesnt faze you You have the skills to retrieve combine and analyze data from a variety of sources and structures You know understanding the data is often the key to great data sciencebrliulstronguBasic QualificationsbrustrongulliBachelors Degree plus 5 years of experience in data analytics or Masters Degree plus 3 years in data analytics or PhDliliAt least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysisliliAt least 1 year of experience with machine learningliliAt least 1 year of experience with relational databasesbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliMasters Degree in STEM field Science Technology Engineering or Mathematics plus 3 years of experience in data analytics or PhD in STEM field Science Technology Engineering or MathematicsliliAt least 1 year of experience working with AWSliliAt least 3 years experience in Python Scala or RliliAt least 3 years experience with machine learningliliAt least 3 years experience with SQLbrliulCapital One will consider sponsoring a new qualified applicant for employment authorization for this positionbrbrJob Category  Data Science
